topic: Copyright Protection in Generative Foundation Models

  entities:
    Generative Foundation Models|Technology
    Copyright Protection|Technological Concept

  proposition: Copyright protection in GenFMs is an evolving challenge.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Copyright Protection|DESCRIBED_BY|evolving challenge

  proposition: Copyright protection in GenFMs encompasses issues of data and model security.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Copyright Protection|INVOLVES|data security
    Copyright Protection|INVOLVES|model security

  proposition: Copyright concerns are expected to gain heightened attention in the near future.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Copyright Protection|EXPECTED_TREND|heightened attention

  proposition: Copyright concerns will receive increased resources from industry and academia.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Copyright Protection|SUPPORTED_BY|industry
    Copyright Protection|SUPPORTED_BY|academia

topic: Synthetic Data Generation in Generative Foundation Models

  entities:
    Generative Foundation Models|Technology
    Synthetic Data Generation|Method

  proposition: GenFMs are increasingly dependent on synthetic data generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Generative Foundation Models|DEPENDS_ON|Synthetic Data Generation

  proposition: Synthetic data generation addresses data scarcity.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Synthetic Data Generation|SOLVES|data scarcity

  proposition: Synthetic data generation expands GenFM capabilities.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Synthetic Data Generation|ENHANCES|Generative Foundation Models

  proposition: Synthetic data generation is effective in instruction tuning.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Synthetic Data Generation|EFFECTIVE_IN|instruction tuning

  proposition: Synthetic data generation is effective in code generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Synthetic Data Generation|EFFECTIVE_IN|code generation

  proposition: Synthetic data generation is effective in complex reasoning tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Synthetic Data Generation|EFFECTIVE_IN|complex reasoning tasks

topic: Synthetic Data Generation Approaches

  entities:
    Self-Instruct|Method
    Constitutional AI|Approach
    Evol-Instruct|Method
    DyVal|Method
    DARG|Method

  proposition: Self-Instruct established the foundation for automated instruction generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Self-Instruct|PIONEERED|automated instruction generation

  proposition: Constitutional AI introduced recursive refinement techniques for synthetic conversations.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Constitutional AI|INTRODUCED|recursive refinement techniques
    Constitutional AI|FOCUSED_ON|synthetic conversations

  proposition: Evol-Instruct advanced instruction complexity through iterative systems.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evol-Instruct|ADVANCED|instruction complexity
    Evol-Instruct|USES|iterative systems

  proposition: DyVal and DARG pioneered directed acyclic graph structures for generating training and evaluation samples.
    entity-entity relationships:
    DyVal|COLLABORATES_WITH|DARG
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    DyVal|PIONEERED|directed acyclic graph structures
    DARG|PIONEERED|directed acyclic graph structures
    DyVal|FOCUSED_ON|training and evaluation samples generation
    DARG|FOCUSED_ON|training and evaluation samples generation
